plot: Take three animals, one from the farm, one from the desert, and another the jungle. Put them together, although the meeting seems improbable, and you'll have the moral of the tale.
title: Les fables en délire: la poule, l'éléphant et le serpent
plot_es: Take three animals, one from the farm, one from the desert, and another the jungle. Put them together, although the meeting seems improbable, and you'll have the moral of the tale.
original_name: Les fables en délire: la poule, l'éléphant et le serpent
plot_en: Take three animals, one from the farm, one from the desert, and another the jungle. Put them together, although the meeting seems improbable, and you'll have the moral of the tale.
